title: Owned a Champion I never bought
body: Anyone had the same problem happen to them? I was looking at my owned champion pool tab when I notice I have Master Yi. I don't remember buying him, he isn't listed in my recent purchase history. I had never ever had the desired to play him nor do I want him lol.

replies.body: You sure it's not because of free-week? Is there an exclamation mark on his portrait?

Just making sure. It wouldn't have been the first time I've seen someone make that mistake :P

Go and check your purchase history. As long as you haven't spammed it with singular rune purchases, then that champion purchase should still be recorded there. Note the date and try to recall what you were doing/where you were that day, to see if it could have been you/it was impossible that it was you. It will help identify if someone else has access to your account, and possibly whom.

Nevertheless you should probably change your password just to be safe.

:P DId you buy the "Starting pack?"

and I hear ya, every time I see someone pick master yi I think to myself "oh gawd, here we go again".
I have never bought any bundle packs before, and I think buying champs with RP is a waste
i got morgana randomly idk where she came from
